title: The Halden Testament
outcome: Halden’s secret video will surfaces, revealing his doubts and regrets about the BCI. He admits the system’s harms, apologizes for past abuses, and calls for a permanent end to prediction-based governance. The city holds an emotional vote, deeply divided on whether to erase the BCI forever or try one last reform.

events.description: A sealed video from Halden's old residence is released, in which he confesses his doubts about the BCI and apologizes for systemic abuses.
Citizens gather in large assemblies, debating Halden’s message. Hundreds share personal stories of BCI harm, spurring citywide calls for justice and reparations.
Movement leaders organize a mass vote: keep a reformed BCI, or dismantle it completely. Debate dominates all politics and street life.
The results of the citywide vote are announced—Stenograd is split almost evenly, exposing rifts but opening new dialogue about justice and the future.
